history.title: About Foundation
history.subtitle: In 2010, we embarked on a joint mission to help orphans by establishing a foundation dedicated to supporting them and providing the right conditions for their well-being. Since then, we have implemented a wide range of projects aimed at improving the quality of life for children.
history.text1:
During this period, we have completed a significant number of initiatives to make children's lives happier and more exciting. Our efforts are aimed at creating conditions for the development of children and providing them with the opportunity to find true friends, gain new knowledge and develop their unique talents.
We have successfully organised more than 24 children's camps, each attended by 100 to 180 children. These activities have created unforgettable adventures and a refreshing new environment for hundreds of children who have joined our programmes. At each camp, children had the opportunity to learn, develop, socialise and have the best childhood experience possible.
history.text2: At the end of each camp, for the last 4 years, children have been receiving their favourite magazine "Your Way", which we publish together with our team every six months to preserve memories and summarise the results of the camps. This magazine is a window into the world of achievements and journeys of our participants, and we are proud to be able to preserve this story.

work.title: Our approach includes the following steps:
work.first: Project planning: We start with detailed planning of each project, where we clearly define the goals, objectives, location, scope of work, and number of children involved.
work.second: Analysis of the implementation options: Together with our partners, our team searches for ways to implement projects using existing and potential resources.
work.third: Funding for the project: An important step is to calculate the cost of implementing the project and attract financial support.
work.fourth: Recruitment of children in camps: We offer children the opportunity to join our camps, where they can find memorable adventures and gain new skills.
work.fifth: Project implementation: With our perseverance, dedication and external support from our Partners, we implement each project, giving children bright moments of their childhood and providing them with the opportunity to succeed and develop.
